!Reading Desk: Solina promised to dedicate his life to Einhasad. But for a lot of her father's sins goddess blinded her. Only then humbled the anger. Solina meekly accepted the punishment and continued to serve the goddess, carrying the burden of the sins of the imperial family. Solina led a modest life of a hermit, steadfastly enduring all the hardships. Her kindness and compassion made ​​famous by her throughout Elmoredenu, whose residents Solina revered as a saint.
